description: This tale unravels the mystery of the untrustworthy stairs in a quirky house.
title: Staircase Shenanigans
n_1: Max and Sara stand before the notorious staircase, pondering its deceit.
c1_1: Do you think it's plotting something today?
c2_1: Without a doubt. It's too quiet.
n_2: As they step on, the stairs creak mischievously, hiding their next move.
c1_2: See? It's definitely up to something!
n_3: Halfway up, a step unexpectedly sinks, revealing a hidden compartment.
n_4: They find a treasure map, the staircase's secret finally uncovered.
c1_4: It was guarding a treasure all along!
c2_4: Guess we can trust it with secrets, if not our safety.
